title.native: 治癒魔法の間違った使い方
title.english: The Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic

description:
An ordinary walk home from school turns into an epic journey for Usato. After suddenly being dropped into another world with two fellow students, Usato learns he was summoned there by accident. But things turn around when he discovers a unique aptitude for healing magic! Now, he trains beyond human limitations, using his self-healing abilities to gain absurd strength and unrivaled stamina.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: เวทรักษาที่ไหนเขาใช้กันแบบนี้
Cách dùng sai của ma thuật chữa trị

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Fitness
tags.description: Centers around exercise with the aim of improving physical health.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Cultivation
tags.description: Features characters using training, often martial arts-related, and other special methods to cultivate qi (a component of traditional Chinese philosophy, described as "life force") and gain strength or immortality.

tags.name: Wilderness
tags.description: Predominantly features a location with little to no human activity, such as a deserted island, a jungle, or a snowy mountain range.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

__[Website](http://shogo.strikes.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shogoy)__

__Shougo Yasukawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter, series composer and lyricist.

Takahide Ogata is a Japanese anime director affiliated with [Studio Add](https://anilist.co/studio/7408/)
Starting as an animator and becoming a director, he mainly handles TV series, with his specialty being limited animation. Together with a small staff based in a studio in Saitama prefecture, he makes children's anime, comedic works and many more.

__[Website](http://waterweed.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/waterweed) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/waterweed_jp/) | [Bandcamp](https://waterweed.bandcamp.com/)__

__Formed:__ 2003, Osaka Prefecture, Japan

__Introduction:__
Waterweed is a Japanese three-piece melodic hardcore rock band from the Osaka Prefecture.

__Members:__
- [Tomohiro Ooga](https://twitter.com/Tomohiro_Ohga) (大賀ともひろ) – bassist, vocalist
- [Shotaro Ono](https://twitter.com/tarosly1986) (おのしょうたろう) – guitarist, chorus
- [Shigeo Matsubara](https://twitter.com/waterweeddrum) (まつばらしげお) – drummer

__[Official Website](http://choucho-net.com/)__ | __[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/choucho621/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choucho_)__ | __[NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/3416529) | [Instragram](https://www.instagram.com/choucho621/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGK8Fhw3qDEtHaivTsxfGgg)__ | __[Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5t7eQ2d1UmzfIr9oWQ538Y?autoplay=true)__

__Introduction:__
ChouCho is a Japanese singer-utaite known for doing vocal covers of Vocaloid songs on NicoNico Douga, in addition to making frequent appearances in anime with original songs.

__Biography:__
In 2007, she initially formed the band Lotus*Lotus (stylized as ロータス★ロータス) while still in high school, the band performed covers of songs from anime, then starting from June 2008 she first appeared on NicoNico with her cover of the song "[Black★Rock Shooter](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm3706654)" under stage name ちょうちょ. In 2011, she made her first major debut under record label Lantis, singing the opening theme song to the anime [Kamisama no Memochou](https://anilist.co/anime/10568/Kamisama-no-Memochou/), titled "[Kawaru Mirai](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Un9UiVL6Dms)", and later in the same year she reappeared with the opening theme song to the anime [Mashiroiro Symphony](https://anilist.co/anime/10397/Mashiroiro-Symphony-The-Color-of-Lovers), titled "[Authentic Symphony](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QzGWaS0lyIo)", then in 2012, after releasing her 4th single titled "[Yasashisa no Riyuu](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0hJiMN4Csjw)", she changed her stage name from ちょうちょ to ChouCho. The song was also used as the 1st opening theme song to the anime [Hyouka](https://anilist.co/anime/12189/Hyouka/), which released in 2012.

Her last upload to NicoNico was an album released with Comiket 81, titled "[Little Nostalgia](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm16484379)", featuring 5 songs: Breeze, Beautiful World (Acoustic Ver.), Hana to Hoshi no Monogatari, North York and Under the Maple Tree.

__[Website](http://waterweed.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/waterweed) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/waterweed_jp/) | [Bandcamp](https://waterweed.bandcamp.com/)__

__Formed:__ 2003, Osaka Prefecture, Japan

__Introduction:__
Waterweed is a Japanese three-piece melodic hardcore rock band from the Osaka Prefecture.

__Members:__
- [Tomohiro Ooga](https://twitter.com/Tomohiro_Ohga) (大賀ともひろ) – bassist, vocalist
- [Shotaro Ono](https://twitter.com/tarosly1986) (おのしょうたろう) – guitarist, chorus
- [Shigeo Matsubara](https://twitter.com/waterweeddrum) (まつばらしげお) – drummer

[Website](https://junmurayama.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jun_murayama)

__Introduction:__
Jun Murayama is a Japanese musician, known for doing music composition and arrangement, while also being a music producer, pianist and keyboardist. He is also a member of the bands Venomstrip and FLOWER FLOWER.

__Biography:__
He started playing the piano at the age of three, then later on as a third year college student, he started his professional career after being scouted by the Light Music Club. Following this he joined [Koichi Domoto's](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koichi_Domoto) tour, whom he knew from college.

He's mostly known as the keyboardist to the four-piece rock band FLOWER FLOWER with the stage name mura☆jun, which he joined in 2013. In the band his name was mistakenly introduced as 松潤 (Matsujun) when referring to members, so  instead of his actual stage name mura☆jun the fans have nicknamed him as such.

__[Official Website](http://choucho-net.com/)__ | __[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/choucho621/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choucho_)__ | __[NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/3416529) | [Instragram](https://www.instagram.com/choucho621/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGK8Fhw3qDEtHaivTsxfGgg)__ | __[Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5t7eQ2d1UmzfIr9oWQ538Y?autoplay=true)__

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tomohiro_Ohga) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tomohiro_ohga/)

Tomohiro Ooga is the vocalist and bassist of [waterweed](https://anilist.co/staff/163544/waterweed).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/caitlinsvoice) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/caitlinsvoice/) | [Myspace](https://myspace.com/caitlintiffany) | [Blog](https://kiristokyoto.livejournal.com/)

An American voice actor, voice director, and script writer for Funimation, New Generation Pictures, and Bang Zoom! Entertainment. She's been working in the anime industry since 2004. She grew up in the San Diego area, California, and has been married to Tony Patterson since 2009. Outside of voice acting, Caitlin has worked as an ESL teacher in Spain.
[Website](https://www.jarrod-greene.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/BuffaloBuffalo)

Lucas Almeida is a Brazilian actor, director and voice actor. He is married to [Mayara Stefane](https://anilist.co/staff/197179/).

node.description:
__[Profile (Aria Entertainment)](https://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/)__

A Japanese group of music composers, or a "music production brand" as they call themselves. They generally produce music for video games, anime and recording artists. They are attached to Aria Entertainment.

__Current Members:__ 
[Noriyasu Agematsu](https://anilist.co/staff/103633/Noriyasu-Agematsu) (Producer/Lyricist/Composer)
[Junpei Fujita](https://anilist.co/staff/110557/Junpei-Fujita) (Producer/Composer/Arranger)
[Hitoshi Fujima](https://anilist.co/staff/101273/Hitoshi-Fujima) (Composer/Arranger)
[Daisuke Kikuta](https://anilist.co/staff/147815/Daisuke-Kikuta) (Composer/Arranger)
[Seima Iwahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/146530/Seima-Iwahashi) (Composer/Arranger/Director)
[Ryutaro Fujinaga](https://anilist.co/staff/155960/Ryutaro-Fujinaga) (Lyricist/Composer)
[Ryota Tomaru](https://anilist.co/staff/140532/Ryota-Tomaru) (Composer/Arranger)
[Yuta Kasai](https://anilist.co/staff/259881/Yuuta-Kasai) (Composer/Arranger)
[Yusuke Takeda](https://anilist.co/staff/156645/Yusuke-Takeda) (Lyricist/Composer)
[Asuka Oda](https://anilist.co/staff/155968/Asuka-Oda) (Lyricist)
[Seima Kondou](https://anilist.co/staff/239286/Seima-Kondou) (Composer/Arranger)

__Former Members:__ 
Yasutomo Nakai (2005-2006)
[Masato Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/112097/Masato-Nakayama) (2007-2013)
[Evan Call](https://anilist.co/staff/119999/Evan-Call) (2012-2016)
Tomohiro Kita (2011-2016), Haruki Mori (2009-2018)
[Ryouta Suemasu](https://anilist.co/staff/155969/Ryouta-Suemasu) (2014-2019)
Fujima Hitoshi is a composer and arranger.
